doc.title: IANA

value.content: IANA (Internet Assigned Numbers Authority) is a subsidiary of ICANN charged with recording and/or assigning domain names, IP addresses, and other names and numbers used by Internet protocols.

value.title: See also
value.content:
• Official website
  • IANA on Wikipedia
